name: A Cold Night (BasuKun)
description:
Collect snowflakes, ice blocks and other resources in this relaxing idle incremental game. Gain back your memories, start a village, and find out why this wintery scene feels so natural to you.

  • Collect snowflakes by hovering your mouse over them.
  • Hold click on "Absorb Snowflakes" button to gain back your intelligence (IPs).
  • Unlocks tab will only display unlockables when you have collected 50% of their price in IPs. If there are no unlockables currently displayed, simply collect more IPs until they do!
  • Most buttons and some texts have tooltips when hovering your mouse on them for a second or two.

Enjoy!
